definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: Lilith (Milton Che night-hag), name of a female night-demon haunting desolate Edom; prob. borrowed fr. Bab., Is 34:14 (NH id.; As. lilîtu, Dl: HWB 377; Syr. leliyto0 PS:1951; on the development of legends of Lilith in later Judaism, v. Bux:Lex. Talmud., s.v. Che:ad loc. Grünbaum:ZMG xxxi.1877, 250 f.—Connexion with [[לילה]] perhaps only apparent, a popular etymology).
